ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
6 Cameras: 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 66 IR LEDs, 196 ft IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Vandal proof & water proof
8 Channel DVR with 2TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1 Realtime, supports HDMI & VGA outputs. 960×480 & 30FPS Real-Time Recording.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor,8 Channel 2TB HDD 960H & D1 Realtime Recording+Playback, 6 Effio-E 700 TVL Cameras 66 IR LEDs VariFocal Lens, iPhone Android Viewable
